CurrentPreset: The settings asset to use for this synth

methods.name: GetCurveTangent
methods.doc: Get the curve interpolation type (What the curve is doing between keyframes)

methods.name: GetKeyFrameValuesForTable
methods.doc: Get an array of floats that represent the key frames in the requested curve

methods.name: GetMaxTableIndex
methods.doc: Get the number of curves in the wave table. (returns -1 if there is no asset)

methods.name: GetNumTableEntries
methods.doc: Start BP functionality // Get the number of table elements from Blueprint

methods.name: NoteOff
methods.doc: Starts a new note (retrigs modulators, etc.)

methods.name: NoteOn
methods.doc: Starts a new note (retrigs modulators, etc.)

methods.name: RefreshAllWaveTables
methods.doc: Refresh all wavetables (from Game Thread data)

methods.name: RefreshWaveTable
methods.doc: Refresh a particular wavetable (from Game Thread data)

methods.name: SetAmpEnvelopeAttackTime
methods.doc: Set Amp envelope attack time (msec)

methods.name: SetAmpEnvelopeBiasDepth
methods.doc: Set the bias depth of the the Amp envelope

methods.name: SetAmpEnvelopeBiasInvert
methods.doc: Set whether or not the Amp envelope's bias is inverted

methods.name: SetAmpEnvelopeDecayTime
methods.doc: Set Amp envelope decay time (msec)

methods.name: SetAmpEnvelopeDepth
methods.doc: Set the overall depth of the Amp envelope

methods.name: SetAmpEnvelopeInvert
methods.doc: Set whether or not the Amp envelope is inverted

methods.name: SetAmpEnvelopeReleaseTime
methods.doc: Set Amp envelope release time (msec)

methods.name: SetAmpEnvelopeSustainGain
methods.doc: Set Amp envelope sustain gain [0.0, 1.0]

methods.name: SetCurveInterpolationType
methods.doc:
Set the curve interpolation type (What the curve is doing between keyframes)
This should only be used for live-editing features! (changing the curves at runtime is expensive)

methods.name: SetCurveTangent
methods.doc:
Set the curve tangent ("Curve depth" between keyframes)
This should only be used for live-editing features! (changing the curves at runtime is expensive)

methods.name: SetCurveValue
methods.doc:
Set a Keyframe value given a Table number and Keyframe number.
         Returns false if the request was invalid.
         NewValue will be clamped from +/- 1.0

methods.name: SetFilterEnvelopeAttackTime
methods.doc: Set Low-Pass Filter envelope attack time (msec)

methods.name: SetFilterEnvelopeBiasDepth
methods.doc: Set Low-Pass Filter envelope bias depth

methods.name: SetFilterEnvelopeBiasInvert
methods.doc: Set Low-Pass Filter envelope bias inversion

methods.name: SetFilterEnvelopeDepth
methods.doc: Set Low-Pass Filter envelope depth

methods.name: SetFilterEnvelopeInvert
methods.doc: Set Low-Pass Filter envelope inversion

methods.name: SetFilterEnvelopenDecayTime
methods.doc: Set Low-Pass Filter envelope decay time (msec)

methods.name: SetFilterEnvelopeReleaseTime
methods.doc: Set Low-Pass Filter envelope release time (msec)

methods.name: SetFilterEnvelopeSustainGain
methods.doc: Set Low-Pass Filter envelope sustain gain

methods.name: SetFrequency
methods.doc: Sets the oscillator's frequency

methods.name: SetFrequencyPitchBend
methods.doc: Set a frequency offset in cents (for pitch modulation such as the Pitch Bend Wheel)

methods.name: SetFrequencyWithMidiNote
methods.doc: Set the oscillator's frequency via midi note number

methods.name: SetLowPassFilterResonance
methods.doc: Set the Cut-off frequency of the low-pass filter

methods.name: SetPositionEnvelopeAttackTime
methods.doc: Set Position envelope attack time (msec)

methods.name: SetPositionEnvelopeBiasDepth
methods.doc: Set Position envelope bias depth

methods.name: SetPositionEnvelopeBiasInvert
methods.doc: Set Position envelope bias inversion

methods.name: SetPositionEnvelopeDecayTime
methods.doc: Set Position envelope decay time (msec)

methods.name: SetPositionEnvelopeDepth
methods.doc: Set Position envelope envelope depth

methods.name: SetPositionEnvelopeInvert
methods.doc: Set Position envelope envelope inversion

methods.name: SetPositionEnvelopeReleaseTime
methods.doc: Set Position envelope release time (msec)

methods.name: SetPositionEnvelopeSustainGain
methods.doc: Set Position envelope sustain gain

methods.name: SetPosLfoDepth
methods.doc:
Set the Modulation depth of the Lfo controlling the Table Position around the current position value
         0.0 = no modulation, 1.0 = current position +/- 0.5 (Lfo + Position result will clamp [0.0, 1.0])

methods.name: SetPosLfoFrequency
methods.doc: Set frequency of LFO controlling Table Position (in Hz)

methods.name: SetPosLfoType
methods.doc: Set the shape of the Lfo controlling the position

methods.name: SetSustainPedalState
methods.doc: Inform the synth if the sustain pedal is pressed or not

methods.name: SetWaveTablePosition
methods.doc: Sets the wavetable position. Expects a percentage between 0.0 and 1.0
